description:
LG AI Research has unveiled EXAONE Deep, a reasoning model that excels in complex problem-solving across maths, science, and coding. The company highlighted the global challenge in creating advanced reasoning models, noting that currently, only a handful of organisations with foundational models are actively pursuing this complex area. EXAONE Deep aims to compete directly with […]

The post LG EXAONE Deep is a maths, science, and coding buff appeared first on AI News.
title: LG EXAONE Deep is a maths, science, and coding buff
